name: Verify that aep-gateway will show chained component measures by calling /ui/gateway/measures/chain/{id} with HTTP GET 3 - Verify that we can show chained measures for "Any Prescription Drug Event"
description:
Given that the previous step has completed successfully, this step will verify the following scenarios:
1. Standalone measures will not show component measures chained to them.
2. Event Set measures that have the date range params as the function of the other measure will successfully
show that they are chained together.

The measure that the dependent measure is "chained" to will show up in the dependent measure's children list.
All fields in each MeasureSummaryDTO is expected to be populated with all fields.
descriptionHtml:
Given that the previous step has completed successfully, this step will verify the following scenarios:

  1. Standalone measures will not show component measures chained to them.
  2. Event Set measures that have the date range params as the function of the other measure will successfully
    show that they are chained together.

The measure that the dependent measure is "chained" to will show up in the dependent measure's children list.
All fields in each MeasureSummaryDTO is expected to be populated with all fields.

labels.name: story
labels.value: A user shall be able to view all component measures (upstream) used within a measure with hierarchy

labels.name: suite
labels.value: AEP Gateway - Measure Chaining Integration Test
